extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     MATH210 or MATH211 or MATH212 or MATH217 or MATH312.

basic.description: Similarity and canonical forms. Non-negative matrices: Perron-Frobenius theorem, applications to probability (Markov chains). Matrix differential equations: Stability theory. Estimation of eigenvalues, Gersgorin's theorem, and related inequalities.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Applications of Matrix Algebra
